languages.text: {n}Бросив на вас косой взгляд, арбитр почтительно склоняет голову.{/n} "Прошу простить, я не хотел быть грубым". {n}Проктор принимает кубок, переплетает свою руку с вашей и выпивает амасек могучим глотком. Затем он дарит вам быстрый и не слишком теплый поцелуй и тут же отводит глаза.{/n}

{n}After casting a sidelong glance at you, Solomorne dips his head deferentially.{/n} "I apologise, I did not mean to be rude." {n}He accepts the cup, intertwines his arm with yours, and downs the amasec in a mighty gulp. Then he gives you a quick and not overly heated kiss and immediately averts his eyes.{/n}

Затем он дарит вам быстрый и не слишком теплый поцелуй и тут же отводит глаза.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne sieht dich von der Seite an und senkt unterwürfig den Kopf.{/n} "Verzeiht, ich wollte nicht unhöflich sein." {n}Er nimmt den Becher entgegen, verschränkt seinen Arm mit dem deinen und trinkt den Amasec mit einem großen Schluck. Dann gibt er dir einen schnellen, aber nicht übermäßig leidenschaftlichen Kuss und wendet unverzüglich den Blick ab.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After casting a sidelong glance at you, Solomorne dips his head deferentially.{/n} "I apologise, I did not mean to be rude." {n}He accepts the cup, intertwines his arm with yours, and downs the amasec in a mighty gulp. Then he gives you a quick and not overly heated kiss and immediately averts his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne sieht dich von der Seite an und senkt unterwürfig den Kopf.{/n} "Verzeiht, ich wollte nicht unhöflich sein." {n}Er nimmt den Becher entgegen, verschränkt seinen Arm mit dem deinen und trinkt den Amasec mit einem großen Schluck. Dann gibt er dir einen schnellen, aber nicht übermäßig leidenschaftlichen Kuss und wendet unverzüglich den Blick ab.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Après vous avoir lancé un regard en coin, Solomorne baisse la tête avec déférence.{/n} « Veuillez m'excuser, je ne voulais pas me montrer impoli. » {n}Il prend la coupe, vous donne le bras et avale l'amasec d'une seule gorgée, puis dépose un bref baiser sur vos lèvres, en se gardant d'y mettre trop de passion, et détourne immédiatement le regard.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After casting a sidelong glance at you, Solomorne dips his head deferentially.{/n} "I apologise, I did not mean to be rude." {n}He accepts the cup, intertwines his arm with yours, and downs the amasec in a mighty gulp. Then he gives you a quick and not overly heated kiss and immediately averts his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Après vous avoir lancé un regard en coin, Solomorne baisse la tête avec déférence.{/n} « Veuillez m'excuser, je ne voulais pas me montrer impoli. » {n}Il prend la coupe, vous donne le bras et avale l'amasec d'une seule gorgée, puis dépose un bref baiser sur vos lèvres, en se gardant d'y mettre trop de passion, et détourne immédiatement le regard.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたに横目を向けたあと、ソロモーンは敬意を込めて頭を下げた。{/n}「すみません。無礼に振舞うつもりはありませんでした」{n}彼は杯を受け取り、あなたと腕を組み、アマセックを一気にあおった。それから彼は、あっさりとした、あまり情熱のこもっていないキスを素早く交わして、すぐに視線をそらした。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After casting a sidelong glance at you, Solomorne dips his head deferentially.{/n} "I apologise, I did not mean to be rude." {n}He accepts the cup, intertwines his arm with yours, and downs the amasec in a mighty gulp. Then he gives you a quick and not overly heated kiss and immediately averts his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたに横目を向けたあと、ソロモーンは敬意を込めて頭を下げた。{/n}「すみません。無礼に振舞うつもりはありませんでした」{n}彼は杯を受け取り、あなたと腕を組み、アマセックを一気にあおった。それから彼は、あっさりとした、あまり情熱のこもっていないキスを素早く交わして、すぐに視線をそらした。

languages.text: {n}Tras mirarte de reojo, Solomorne agacha la cabeza en deferencia.{/n} «Discúlpeme, no era mi intención ofender». {n}Acepta la copa, entrelaza su brazo con el tuyo y se bebe el amasec de un trago. Después, te da un beso rápido y falto de pasión antes de apartar la mirada.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After casting a sidelong glance at you, Solomorne dips his head deferentially.{/n} "I apologise, I did not mean to be rude." {n}He accepts the cup, intertwines his arm with yours, and downs the amasec in a mighty gulp. Then he gives you a quick and not overly heated kiss and immediately averts his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras mirarte de reojo, Solomorne agacha la cabeza en deferencia.{/n} «Discúlpeme, no era mi intención ofender». {n}Acepta la copa, entrelaza su brazo con el tuyo y se bebe el amasec de un trago. Después, te da un beso rápido y falto de pasión antes de apartar la mirada.{/n}

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙斜着眼瞥了你一眼，随后恭敬地低下了头。{/n}“我道歉，我并不是有意冒犯。”{n}他接过酒杯，挽着你的胳膊，将杯中酒一饮而尽。随后，他快速给了你一个不太热烈的吻，之后立刻移开了目光。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After casting a sidelong glance at you, Solomorne dips his head deferentially.{/n} "I apologise, I did not mean to be rude." {n}He accepts the cup, intertwines his arm with yours, and downs the amasec in a mighty gulp. Then he gives you a quick and not overly heated kiss and immediately averts his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙斜着眼瞥了你一眼，随后恭敬地低下了头。{/n}“我道歉，我并不是有意冒犯。”{n}他接过酒杯，挽着你的胳膊，将杯中酒一饮而尽。随后，他快速给了你一个不太热烈的吻，之后立刻移开了目光。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, sana yan gözle baktıktan sonra saygıyla başını eğiyor.{/n} "Kabalığım için özür dilerim, bilerek yapmadım." {n}Kadehi alıyor, kolunu seninkine doluyor ve amaseki tek dikişte içiyor. Sonra dudaklarına seri, tutkudan yoksun bir öpücük kondurup anında gözlerini kaçırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After casting a sidelong glance at you, Solomorne dips his head deferentially.{/n} "I apologise, I did not mean to be rude." {n}He accepts the cup, intertwines his arm with yours, and downs the amasec in a mighty gulp. Then he gives you a quick and not overly heated kiss and immediately averts his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne, sana yan gözle baktıktan sonra saygıyla başını eğiyor.{/n} "Kabalığım için özür dilerim, bilerek olmadı." {n}Kadehi alıyor, kolunu seninkine doluyor ve amaseki fondip yapıyor. Sonra dudaklarına seri, tutkudan yoksun bir öpücük kondurup anında gözlerini kaçırıyor.{/n}
